content: I closed TB and re-opened it and now I was able to get the NEXA account to work, it did the google prompt right away. However, the outlook.com account still won't create the Microsoft prompt and it keeps saying Authentication failed without the office365 prompt ever appearing.
creator: chunnel

content: I deleted my profiles and all of Thunderbird including all files in Library. I reinstalled it and tried again. Now I was able to get the outlook.com account to work but I cannot get the nexamortgage (google) account to work again, despite being able to do it just before deleting everything. It won't prompt for the google login. However, I can get my kw.com (keller williams) account to work and that is also google based.
creator: chunnel

content:
and yet I hasve exactly that, a highlight of the selected message. But the colours usaed in those are directly derived from the operating system and most folk that report these types of error do not use a default operating system theme.

Check in Thunderbird themes and try the light and dark themes as opposed to the default theme which is the one that listens to the operating system for the highlight colour.
creator: MattAuSupport
